Seems it doesn't keep a running save of your game or at least you can lose your progress for no apparent reason. Can be particularly frustrating when you're on a 100k score streak.

It's a fun game which anyone can play. I play this everytime I am bored but i still love it. If there were any challenges or some sort of mini  games in the game which involve 2048 tiles would be the best thing.  Love it otherwise
It's a very exciting game  But it's extremely frustrating when you inadvertently touch the screen it moves and messes up your game play. There is no "take back" ability to remedy this.
A good time waster, but nothing else. Very challenging and brain taxing when trying to complete, but not a good math tool for anyone who passed 2nd grade multiplication.

Animations make progress much too slow and feel buggy. No need for a little 
shimmer at the point at which the numbers merge. Takes twice as long to 
play as a normal game
Sometimes the board fills up and I don't get 2048... Great game anyway!
Overall an awesome game. The only thing I would do is the possibility to undo more than 1 step but that would decrease the difficulty of the game though.
Loved it! This is so addicting! If you haven't downloaded it already do it now! Plus I'm 13 years old so don't think it's for "old" people lmao.
I love it. It teaches me to think outside the box and add up high numbers. I thank this game forgiving me something really easy but really educational to learn from.

I really like the game and it is a really good time waster but there is one problem. Whenever I get close to losing but I can see a direct path to match a lot of tiles it just says that I lost.  Fix and I rate 5
You don't get to see the field after you 'lost'. The app itself is very resource hungry and drains your battery faster than an electric chair.

I always end up at 666 for some reason must be a bit faulty. Since installing this game I had multiple paranormal activities going on in my house and for some reason at 3 am I keep seeing a deformed chubaca chanting at my window. Don't install this game my warning.
